title: What can I do if, when I play games, my phone's touch screen's touch positions are incorrect?
answer: If the touch positions are incorrect when using your phone to play games, check whether you hid the virtual buttons below the screen when playing the game. If so, just swipe up from the bottom of the screen to drag the virtual buttons back up. The touch positions should return to normal. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140226)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140227) []()![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140228) The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
